text: Rodri may refer to: * Rodri (footballer, born 1934). full name Francisco Rodríguez García, Spanish former football defender * Rodri (footballer, born 1971), full name Antonio Rodríguez Saravia, Spanish former football forward and manager * Rodri (footballer, born 1979), full name Rodrigo Gimeno Molina, Spanish former football midfielder * Rodri (footballer, born 1984), full name Sergio Rodríguez García, Spanish football defender * Rodri (footballer, born 1985), full name Rodrigo Ángel Gil Torres, Spanish football midfielder * Rodri (footballer, born 1986), full name Rodrigo Suárez Peña, Spanish former football midfielder * Rodri (footballer, born 1990), full name Rodrigo Ríos Lozano, Spanish football forward * Rodri (footballer, born 1996), full name Rodrigo Hernández Cascante, Spanish football midfielder ==See also== * Rodrigo (disambiguation) * Rodriguez (disambiguation)
title: Rodri
